thread.title: Nets Will Feature Infor Logo on Jersey: Latest Photos, Comments and Reaction
thread.title_full: Nets Will Feature Infor Logo on Jersey: Latest Photos, Comments and Reaction

author: Mike Chiari
title: Nets Will Feature Infor Logo on Jersey: Latest Photos, Comments and Reaction
text: Nets Will Feature Infor Logo on Jersey: Latest Photos, Comments and Reaction Ron Elkman/Sports Imagery/Getty Images Mike Chiari Featured Columnist February 8, 2017 On Wednesday, the Brooklyn Nets announced they will soon begin wearing the logo of enterprise software company Infor on their jerseys. The organization tweeted the following preview: Brooklyn Nets @BrooklynNets NEWS: Weâ€™re looking forward to the future, and we're proud that @Infor will be a part of it. https://t.co/EAUgekqz2e Teams across the league will begin sporting jersey ads during the 2017-18 season , when Nike takes over as the NBA 's uniform provider. Per Scott Soshnick of Bloomberg Sports, the agreement between the Nets and Infor is worth $8 million. According to Steven Slayford of SportBusiness.com, the NBA looks poised to easily reach its sponsorship goals following Wednesday's announcement: Steven Slayford @stevenslayford At this rate, NBA jersey revenue set to clear Adam Silver's target of $100m pa by big margin. 3-year trial could be success before starting. The Nets aren't the first team to reveal an advertising partnership for the 2017-18 season, as the Philadelphia 76ers signed on with StubHub , the Sacramento Kings joined forces with Blue Diamond Growers and the Boston Celtics struck a deal with General Electric . Like the new article format? !
